forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 2C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 35F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 22F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near -0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light snow later at night. Low -3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light snow after midnight. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow during the morning will give way to some light rain during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow during the morning will become a mix of wintry precipitation during the afternoon. High 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and freezing rain expected. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of rain and freezing rain...changing to all freezing rain overnight. Low around 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low near -5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 24F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of freezing drizzle. Low near -10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of freezing drizzle. Low near 15F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of freezing drizzle in the evening...becoming partly cloudy overnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of freezing drizzle early...becoming partly cloudy overnight. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow flurries and snow showers, especially overnight hours. Low -4C with temps rising to 1 to -1. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low 25F with temps rising to near freezing. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the overnight hours. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening will become rain and snow showers in the overnight hours. Low around 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
